articles.title: NASA spacecraft snaps gorgeous new photo of Jupiter's moons Io and Europa - Space.com
articles.description: NASA's Juno spacecraft flew close to Jupiter on Jan. 12, capturing a stunning new view of the planet and two of its moons, lo and Europa.
articles.content:
NASA's Juno spacecraft beamed back stunning new photos of Jupiter's moons
, Io and Europa. 
Juno's latest view of the two moons was captured during the spacecraft's 39th close flyby of Jupiter

articles.title: NASA Perseverance Rover's Self-Driving Capabilities Put to the Test in Rush to Martian Delta - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The rover’s self-driving capabilities will be put to the test this month as it begins a record-breaking series of sprints to its next sampling location. NASA’s Perseverance Mars rover is trying to cover more distance in a single month than any rover before it…
articles.content:
NASA’s Perseverance Mars rover looks back at its wheel tracks on March 17, 2022, the 381st Martian day, or sol, of the mission. Credit: NASA/JPL-Caltech
